net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.configuration
Class MultiplexingConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.configuration.MultiplexingConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration
public class MultiplexingConfiguration
extends Object
implements Configuration

Configuration that multiplexes a master and a slave configuration.

The mulitplexer delegates all requests to the master as long as the master can provide a configuration, if it cannot then the request is delegated to the slave configuration.

Version:
1.8 (2008/03/30 12:43:19)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.5.3

Constructor Detail

MultiplexingConfiguration

public MultiplexingConfiguration(Configuration master,
                                 Configuration slave)
Creates a new multiplexing configuration for the specified master and slave.

The mulitplexer delegates all requests to the master as long as the master can provide a configuration, if it cannot then the request is delegated to the slave configuration.

Parameters:
master - the master configuration to delegate to.
slave - the slave configuration to delegate to if the master cannot handle a request.
Since:
1.5.3

hasValue

public boolean hasValue(String key)
Description copied from interface: Configuration
Check if the configuration supports the specified key.

Specified by:
hasValue in interface Configuration
Implementation Notes:
Checks if either the master or slave configuration has the value, in this order.
Parameters:
key - the key to check.
Returns:
true if the specified key is supported, false otherwise.
Since:
1.5.3
